text: The 1982 Soviet Cup was an association football cup competition of the Soviet Union. The winner of the competition, Dinamo Kiev qualified for the continental tournament. ==Competition schedule== ===Group stage=== Games took place between February 19 – March 4, 1982. ====Group I==== ====Group II==== ====Group III==== ====Group IV==== ====Group V==== ====Group VI==== ====Group VII==== ===Play-off stage=== ====Round of 16==== The base game day was March 14, 1982 {| style="width:100%;" cellspacing="1" |- !width=20%| !width=12%| !width=20%| ! |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Dnepr Dnepropetrovsk |align=center|1:0 | SKA Rostov-na-Donu | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Iskra Smolensk |align=center|1:5 | Dinamo Minsk | (in Moscow) |- style=font- size:90% |align=right| Kuban Krasnodar |align=center|0:1 | Fakel Voronezh | (in Sochi) |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Pakhtakor Tashkent |align=center|1:1 | Neftchi Baku |, |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Tavria Simferopol |align=center|2:1 | Ararat Yerevan | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Torpedo Moscow |align=center|1:0 | Daugava Riga | (in Adler) |} ====Quarterfinals==== The base game day was March 21, 1982 {| style="width:100%;" cellspacing="1" |- !width=20%| !width=12%| !width=20%| ! |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Dinamo Kiev |align=center|1:0 | Dinamo Minsk | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Dinamo Tbilisi |align=center|4:1 | Tavria Simferopol | |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Fakel Voronezh |align=center|1:2 | Dnepr Dnepropetrovsk | (in Sochi) |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Pakhtakor Tashkent |align=center|1:1 | Torpedo Moscow |, |} ====Semifinals==== {| style="width:100%;" cellspacing="1" |- !width=20%| !width=12%| !width=20%| ! |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Dnepr Dnepropetrovsk |align=center|0:2 | Torpedo Moscow | (April 10, 1982) |- style=font-size:90% |align=right| Dinamo Kiev |align=center|2:0 | Dinamo Tbilisi | (April 29, 1982) |} ====Final==== ==External links== * Complete calendar. helmsoccer.narod.ru * 1982 Soviet Cup.
